src:
Slavni Japanac ima novi klub
07 Nov 2019, 15:11 by Milos
Keisuke Honda nastaviće karijeru u Viteseu iz Arnema.
Čuveni ofanzivni vezista iz Japana potpisao je ugovor do kraja sezone sa članom holandske Erdevizije.
Honda ima 33 godine, a tokom karijere je nastupao za Nagoju, VVV-Venlo, CSKA iz Moskve, Milan, meksičku Pačuku i Melburn Viktori.
Igrao je za selekciju Japana na tri Mundijala, a ukupno je na 98 mečeva za nacionalni tim postigao 37 golova.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The famous Japanese has a new club
07 Nov 2019, 15:11 by Milos
Keisuke Honda will continue his career at Vitese from Arnem.
The famous offensive midfielder from Japan has signed a contract for the remainder of the season with a member of the Dutch Airways.
Honda is 33 years old and has played for Nagoya, VVV-Venlo, CSKA Moscow, Milan, Mexican Pachuca and Melbourne Victory throughout his career.
He played for the Japanese selection in three World Cups, scoring a total of 98 goals in 98 matches for the national team.
